text: Atif Aslam (born 12 March 1983) is a Pakistani singer, songwriter and actor. He mainly sings Hindi, Urdu and panjabi songs. He has won many Lux Style Awards and he also received Tamgha-e-Imtiaz in 2008. The first movie in which he acted was Pakistani movie, Bol. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani singer- songwriters Category:Pakistani movie actors Category:Punjabi people Category:Bollywood playback singers
title: Atif Aslam
